explains: v. 强制推行，强制实行；把（自己的观点、信仰等）强加于；打扰，麻烦；把（活字页）拼版；欺骗
wordGroup: impose on 利用；欺骗；施加影响于
impose a fine 处以罚款

sentences.en: He has tried to impose solutions to the country's problems by fiat.
sentences.cn: 他已经试图采取强制性法令来解决该国的问题。

sentences.en: Congress can impose strict conditions on the bank.
sentences.cn: 国会可能会迫使这家银行接受苛刻的条件。

sentences.en: She didn't want to impose her values on her family.
sentences.cn: 她并不想勉强家人接受自己的价值观。
